casebody.data:
Ira ALSTON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 4, 2018

Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Brenda Hans, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Ira Alston's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 907, 177 A.3d 1207 (2018), is denied.
